attributes.action: Make it compulsory for petrol stations to have a fully functioning tyre air pressure machine and water available at all times....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should a fuel dispensing outlet not have a fullly functioning tyre air pressure machine and water available at all times they should not be allowed to sell fuel until such a time as they have. Many outlets view these items as luxuries instead of the essential pieces of equipment needed to make vehicles and roads safer.
